name: Flying ship
description: This is an interactive story based on Russian fairytale of the same name. The king wished to marry the daughter to the one who will construct the flying ship. But it was constructed by simple rural guy Ivan for whom it is necessary to play. But the king does not wish to give out the daughter for Ivan and starts to think of different riddles. If it will be not gained by friends whom it can find on road there will be a bad end.
